plot: 2 couples decide to spend a few days at a luxurious villa, located at Glyfada. The film goes showing their sexual activities until they start dropping dead, one by one! Who is the mysterious killer?
title: Exi diestrammenes zitoun dolofono
plot_es: 2 couples decide to spend a few days at a luxurious villa, located at Glyfada. The film goes showing their sexual activities until they start dropping dead, one by one! Who is the mysterious killer?
plot_en: 2 couples decide to spend a few days at a luxurious villa, located at Glyfada. The film goes showing their sexual activities until they start dropping dead, one by one! Who is the mysterious killer?
